title: Welcome to Sugar’s Poison Shop ~if You Mess Around, You’ll Die, Okay?~ - Novel Updates
tags: Appearance Different from Actual Age   Child Protagonist   Dark   Death   Death of Loved Ones   Depictions of Cruelty   Dragons   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Obsessive Love   Pharmacist   Poisons   R-18   Reincarnated in Another World   Shota   Store Owner
author: Kaburagi Uriko   鏑木うりこ
description:
I am a little bit strange. I ate aconite, a deadly poison, out of curiosity. Then, I was reincarnated into another world and ended up living with poison. In this turbulent world, I eat poison.

 “I’m going to try all kinds of poison that I could’ve only tasted once before!”

I ignored the cold stare of the person I’m living with as I smiled again today in satisfaction.>
